thread.title: Forecast: Sunny Skies, Followed by Water Restrictions
thread.title_full: Forecast: Sunny Skies, Followed by Water Restrictions - WSJ

author: Heather Haddon
title: Forecast: Sunny Skies, Followed by Water Restrictions
text:
As area residents enjoy what is predicted to be another sunny weekend, they are also facing an unpleasant consequence: diminishing water reserves.
This summerâ€™s dry conditions have turned lawns brown and reduced water levels in area reservoirs, particularly in North Jersey and lower parts of New York state. While utilities and towns are currently asking for voluntary water reductions, they could become mandatory if the dry conditions... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
